privacy_policy_intro_1: Portal Paraíso (“we”, “our”, or “us”) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy_policy_intro_2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard information when you visit our website, use our app, or interact with our services.

privacy_policy_s1_a_li1: Name, email address, and account details
privacy_policy_s1_a_li2: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
privacy_policy_s1_a_li3: Device and usage data (IP address, language settings, app version)
privacy_policy_s1_b_li1: Questions, readings, and preferences entered in the oracles or spiritual tools
privacy_policy_s1_b_li2: Interaction data generated during AI consultations and personalized recommendations
privacy_policy_s1_c_p1: We use cookies and analytics tools to understand how users interact with our website and app. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy_policy_s2_li1: Provide and personalize services and spiritual experiences
privacy_policy_s2_li3: Improve the performance and content of our app and website
privacy_policy_s2_li4: Communicate updates, promotions, and user support
privacy_policy_s2_li5: Ensure compliance with legal and security requirements
privacy_policy_s2_p1: Portal Paraíso may also use AI systems (the Oracle) to analyze user input and provide automated spiritual responses and product suggestions.
privacy_policy_s3_intro: Under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), our legal bases for processing personal data include:
privacy_policy_s3_li1: <0>Performance of a contract:</0> To deliver purchased services or products.
privacy_policy_s3_li2: <0>Consent:</0> When you opt-in to marketing communications or non-essential cookies.
privacy_policy_s3_li3: <0>Legitimate interest:</0> To maintain and improve our services securely.
privacy_policy_s3_li4: <0>Legal obligation:</0> To comply with Portuguese or EU legal requirements.
privacy_policy_s4_p1: All collected data is stored securely on European servers in compliance with GDPR standards. We implement technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of personal data. Payment details are processed exclusively by certified third parties (e.g., Stripe, PayPal, App Store, Google Play). Portal Paraíso does not store or have direct access to full payment information.
privacy_policy_s5_p1: We retain personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, or as required by law. Users can request deletion or anonymization of their data at any time (see section 7 below).
privacy_policy_s6_p1: Portal Paraíso uses artificial intelligence (“the Oracle”) to provide personalized readings and experiences. AI-generated content is automated and based on user input — it does not make binding decisions or offer professional advice. You acknowledge that AI responses are for spiritual and entertainment purposes only.
privacy_policy_s7_intro: As a user within the European Union, you have the right to:
privacy_policy_s7_li1: Access and obtain a copy of your data
privacy_policy_s7_p1: To exercise these rights, contact us at: <1>portalparaiso25@gmail.com</1>
privacy_policy_s7_p2: We will respond within 30 days of receiving your request.
privacy_policy_s8_intro: We may share limited data with:
privacy_policy_s8_li1: <0>Payment processors</0> (e.g., Stripe, PayPal, App Store, Google Play)
privacy_policy_s8_p1: We do not sell, rent, or trade user data with third parties.
privacy_policy_s9_p1: When human-led consultations become available, personal and spiritual information shared during sessions may be processed to schedule appointments, provide the service, and improve quality. All consultants will operate under confidentiality and GDPR compliance. Users will be asked to accept specific terms before participating in live consultations.
privacy_policy_s10_p1: Portal Paraíso is intended for users aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If you believe a minor has provided us with personal data, please contact us immediately.
privacy_policy_s11_p1: Portal Paraíso reserves the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Updates will be published on our website and in the app. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
